org.ensembl.datamodel
Interface AffyArray

All Superinterfaces:
Persistent, java.io.Serializable
public interface AffyArray
extends Persistent

An Affymetrix oligo microarray chip which contains probes.

Author:
Craig Melsopp
See Also:
AffyProbe, AffyFeature
